sections.heading: Jailer; neglect of duty; penalty
sections.text: The officer in charge of any municipal prison or jail who fails to comply with the provisions of sections 47-201 to 47-205 or the rules prescribed by the Jail Standards Board shall be guilty of a Class V misdemeanor.SourceLaws 1915, c. 208, ยง 6, p. 463;C.S.1922, ยง 30
